briefdescription.para: Get a default configuration for an ADC12 instance.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to the configuration struct of adc12_config_t.

briefdescription.para: Get a default configuration for an ADC12 channel.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to the configuration struct of adc12_channel_config_t.

briefdescription.para: De-initialize an ADC12 instance.

parameterdescription.para: An ADC12 peripheral base address.

simplesect.para: A result of de-initializing an ADC12 instance.

parameterdescription.para: De-initialize an ADC12 instance successfully. Please refer to hpm_stat_t.
De-initialize an ADC12 instance unsuccessfully due to passing one or more invalid arguments. Please refer to hpm_stat_t.

briefdescription.para: Initialize an ADC12 instance.

parameterdescription.para: An ADC12 peripheral base address.
A pointer to the configuration struct of adc12_config_t.

simplesect.para: A result of initializing an ADC12 instance.

parameterdescription.para: Initialize an ADC12 instance successfully. Please refer to hpm_stat_t.
Initialize an ADC12 instance unsuccessfully due to passing one or more invalid arguments. Please refer to hpm_stat_t.

inbodydescription.para: disable adc When the adc is processing data, it will generate an error to initialize the adc again, so you need to shut down the adc before initializing it.

briefdescription.para: Initialize an ADC12 channel.

parameterdescription.para: An ADC12 peripheral base address.
A pointer to the configuration struct of adc12_channel_config_t.

simplesect.para: A result of initializing an ADC12 channel.

parameterdescription.para: Initialize an ADC12 channel successfully. Please refer to hpm_stat_t.
Initialize an ADC12 channel unsuccessfully due to passing one or more invalid arguments. Please refer to hpm_stat_t.

briefdescription.para: Get thresholds of an ADC12 channel.

parameterdescription.para: An ADC12 peripheral base address.
An ADC12 channel number
A pointer to the structure of channel threshold

simplesect.para: A result of getting thresholds of an ADC12 channel .

parameterdescription.para: Initialize an ADC12 channel successfully. Please refer to hpm_stat_t.
Initialize an ADC12 channel unsuccessfully due to passing one or more invalid arguments. Please refer to hpm_stat_t.

briefdescription.para: Configure the the period mode for an ADC12 instance.

parameterdescription.para: An ADC12 peripheral base address.
A pointer to the configuration struct of adc12_prd_config_t.

simplesect.para: A result of configuring the the period mode for an ADC12 instance.

parameterdescription.para: Configure the the period mode successfully. Please refer to hpm_stat_t.
Configure the the period mode unsuccessfully due to passing one or more invalid arguments. Please refer to hpm_stat_t.

briefdescription.para: Configure the the sequence mode for an ADC12 instance.

parameterdescription.para: An ADC12 peripheral base address.
A pointer to configuration struct of adc12_seq_config_t.

simplesect.para: A result of configuring the the sequence mode for an ADC12 instance.

parameterdescription.para: Configure the the sequence mode successfully. Please refer to hpm_stat_t.
Configure the the sequence mode unsuccessfully due to passing one or more invalid arguments. Please refer to hpm_stat_t.

briefdescription.para: Configure the preemption mode for an ADC12 instance.

parameterdescription.para: An ADC12 peripheral base address.
A pointer to configuration struct of adc12_pmt_config_t.

simplesect.para: A result of configuring the preemption mode for an ADC12 instance.

parameterdescription.para: Configure the preemption mode successfully. Please refer to hpm_stat_t.
Configure the preemption mode unsuccessfully due to passing one or more invalid arguments. Please refer to hpm_stat_t.

briefdescription.para: Configure the stop position offset in the specified memory of DMA write operation for the sequence mode.

parameterdescription.para: An ADC12 peripheral base address.
A stop position offset.

briefdescription.para: Configure the start address of DMA write operation for the preemption mode.

parameterdescription.para: An ADC12 peripheral base address.
A start address of DMA write operation.

briefdescription.para: Configure the start address of DMA write operation for the sequence mode.

parameterdescription.para: An ADC12 peripheral base address.
A pointer to configuration struct of adc12_dma_config_t.

simplesect.para: An implementation result of DMA initializing for the sequence mode

parameterdescription.para: ADC12 initialize in sequence mode successfully. Please refert to hpm_stat_t.
ADC12 initialize in sequence mode unsuccessfully due to passing invalid arguments. Please refert to hpm_stat_t.

briefdescription.para: Get all ADC12 status flags.

parameterdescription.para: An ADC12 peripheral base address.

simplesect.para: A mask indicating all corresponding interrupt statuses.

parameterdescription.para: mask. Please refer to adc12_irq_event_t.

briefdescription.para: Set value of the WAIT_DIS bit. The ADC does not block access to the associated peripheral bus until the ADC has completed its conversion. *.

parameterdescription.para: An ADC12 peripheral base address.

xrefdescription.para: This API will be removed from V2.0.x

briefdescription.para: Set value of the WAIT_DIS bit. ADC blocks access to the associated peripheral bus until the ADC completes the conversion.

parameterdescription.para: An ADC12 peripheral base address.

xrefdescription.para: This API will be removed from V2.0.x

briefdescription.para: Set nonblocking read in oneshot mode.

simplesect.para: An ADC does not block access to the associated peripheral whether it completes a conversion or not.

parameterdescription.para: An ADC12 peripheral base address.

briefdescription.para: Set blocking read in oneshot mode.

simplesect.para: An ADC blocks access to the associated peripheral bus until it completes a conversion.

parameterdescription.para: An ADC12 peripheral base address.

briefdescription.para: Judge whether the current setting is none-blocking mode or not.

parameterdescription.para: An ADC12 peripheral base address.

simplesect.para: A result indicating the status of bus waiting.

parameterdescription.para: means that nonblocking reading.
means that blocking reading.

briefdescription.para: Get the status of a conversion validity.

parameterdescription.para: An ADC12 peripheral base address.
An ADC12 peripheral channel.

simplesect.para: Status indicating the validity of the current conversion result.
This function is only used when the WAIT_DIS bit in the BUF_RESULT register is 1.

briefdescription.para: Clear the status flags.

parameterdescription.para: An ADC12 peripheral base address.
A mask that means the specified flags to be cleared. Please refer to adc12_irq_event_t.

simplesect.para: Only the specified flags can be cleared by writing the INT_STS register.

briefdescription.para: Enable interrupts.

parameterdescription.para: An ADC12 peripheral base address.
A mask indicating the specified ADC interrupt events. Please refer to adc12_irq_event_t.

briefdescription.para: Disable interrupts.

parameterdescription.para: An ADC12 peripheral base address.
A mask indicating the specified interrupt events. Please refer to adc12_irq_event_t.

briefdescription.para: Trigger ADC conversions by software in sequence mode.

parameterdescription.para: An ADC12 peripheral base address.

simplesect.para: An implementation result of getting an ADC12 software trigger.

parameterdescription.para: ADC12 software triggers successfully. Please refer to hpm_stat_t.
ADC12 software triggers unsuccessfully. Please refer to hpm_stat_t.

briefdescription.para: Trigger ADC conversions by software in preemption mode.

parameterdescription.para: An ADC12 peripheral base address.
A trigger channel number(e.g. TRIG0A,TRIG0B,TRIG0C...).

simplesect.para: An implementation result of getting an ADC12 software trigger.

parameterdescription.para: ADC12 software triggers successfully. Please refer to hpm_stat_t.
ADC12 software triggers unsuccessfully. Please refer to hpm_stat_t.

briefdescription.para: Get the result in oneshot mode.

parameterdescription.para: An ADC12 peripheral base address.
An ADC12 peripheral channel.
A pointer to an ADC12 conversion result.

simplesect.para: An implementation result of getting an ADC12 conversion result in oneshot mode.

parameterdescription.para: Get the result of an ADC12 conversion in oneshot mode successfully. Please refer to hpm_stat_t.
Get the result of an ADC12 conversion in oneshot mode unsuccessfully due to passing invalid arguments. Please refer to hpm_stat_t.

briefdescription.para: Get the result in the period mode.

parameterdescription.para: An ADC12 peripheral base address.
An ADC12 peripheral channel.
A pointer to a specified ADC12 conversion result

simplesect.para: An implementation of getting an ADC12 conversion result in the period mode.

parameterdescription.para: Get the result of an ADC12 conversion in the period mode successfully. Please refer to hpm_stat_t.
Get the result of an ADC12 conversion in the period mode unsuccessfully due to passing invalid arguments. Please refer to hpm_stat_t.

briefdescription.para: Define ADC12 validity check for the signal type.
Define ADC12 validity check for the channel number.
Define ADC12 validity check for the channel sample cycle.
Define ADC12 validity check for the trigger number.
Define ADC12 validity check for the trigger length.
Define ADC12 validity check for the sequence length.
Define ADC12 validity check for the DMA buffer length in the sequence mode.
Define ADC12 validity check for the DMA buffer length in the preemption mode.
Define ADC12 sample signal types.
Define ADC12 resolutions.
Define ADC12 conversion modes.
Define ADC12 Clock Divider.

detaileddescription.para: This mask indicates that a trigger conversion is complete.
This mask indicates that a conflict caused by software-triggered conversions.
This mask indicates that a conflict caused by hardware-triggered conversions.
This mask indicates that a conflict caused when bus reading from different channels.
This mask indicates that a conflict caused by sequence-triggered conversions.
This mask indicates that a conflict caused by hardware-triggered conversions.
This mask indicates that DMA is stopped currently.
This mask indicates that all of the configured conversion(s) in a queue is(are) complete.
This mask indicates that one of the configured conversion(s) in a queue is complete.
This mask indicates that DMA FIFO is full currently.

briefdescription.para: Define ADC12 irq events.
